title: SEC’s Caroline Crenshaw Exit Fuels Bitcoin and XRP Rally—Why the All-Republican Panel Could Push Crypto Higher in 2026
description: The SEC’s Caroline Crenshaw crypto saga ended on January 2, 2026, when the agency’s last Democratic commissioner officially departed.
